title: Strengthening AI Practical Skills: Action Learning-Based Mathematical Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can define real-world workplace mathematical problems using an action learning process and perform analytical steps.
In a PBL environment, learners can collaborate with team members to derive and execute over three problem-solving strategies.
Learners can document problem-solving processes using digital tools and submit results based on evaluation criteria.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
